spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent room adjacency and wall alignment. Door placements are generally accurate, although some internal door swing directions are simplified. Window positioning matches the plan well.

structural_fidelity.notes: Full compliance. No text labels or dimensions present. Floating model on dark background with roof removed. No missing or hallucinated rooms.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture mapping is highly consistent. The kitchen island and dining arrangements correlate well with the plan. Minor deductions for simplified block geometry replacing specific stove/sink outlines.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect low-poly execution and perspective. Deducted minor points for soft shadows which, while subtle, lean slightly away from pure flat shading.

detected_errors.description: Minor simplification of door swing geometry compared to floor plan notation.
Very subtle ambient occlusion/soft shadows present, though style is predominantly flat-shaded.
